requests.request_headers:
Accept: application/json
Content-Type: application/json
Host: example.org
Cookie:
requests.response_headers:
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Location: http://example.org/orders

requests.curl: curl http://localhost:3000/orders/1 -X DELETE -H "Accept: application/json" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Host: example.org" -H "Cookie: "
